key.name: boot-wait
key.summary: Time to wait before first check (seconds)
key.description: A first check is made this number of seconds after startup

key.name: check-interval
key.summary: Interval between updates check (minutes)
key.description: Time to wait between two automatic checks

key.name: always-visible
key.summary: Indicator is always visble
key.description: If true, the indicator is always visible, even when non updates are pending

key.name: show-count
key.summary: Show updates count on indicator
key.description: If true, the indicator will display the number of updates pending

key.name: notify
key.summary: Send a notification when new updates are available
key.description: Send a notification when new updates are available

key.name: verbosity
key.summary: How much information to show on notifications

key.name: transient
key.summary: Use transient notifications (auto dismiss)

key.name: check-cmd
key.summary: Command to run to check for updated packages.
key.description: Command to run to check for updated packages.

key.name: allow-no-passwd
key.summary: Allow checks for updates without a passwrd

key.name: check-cmd-no-passwd
key.summary: Command to run to check for updates without password.
key.description: Command to run to check for updates without passowrd.

key.name: update-cmd
key.summary: Command to run to update packages.
key.description: Command to run to update packages.

key.name: output-on-terminal
key.summary: Show the output of the upgrade process on a terminal window
key.description: This is a safer way of upgrading packages.

key.name: terminal
key.summary: Terminal and options to use
key.description: Terminal and options to execute a shell for the upgrade process

key.name: strip-versions
key.summary: Remove version numbers from checkupdates output

key.name: auto-expand-list
key.summary: Auto-open list submenu when updates count is lower than this number

key.name: last-check-date
key.summary: Date and time of the last time a check for updates was run.
key.description: This is stored and used on the next boot.

key.name: new-packages
key.summary: Show a list of new packages
key.description: When a new package is found in the repository, it is added to a list.

key.name: obsolete-packages
key.summary: Show a list of obsolete packages
key.description: When an obsolete package is found, it is added to a list.

key.name: residual-packages
key.summary: Show a list of residual packages
key.description: When config files from package are not deleted after removal, the package is added to a list.

key.name: autoremovable-packages
key.summary: Show a list of autoremovable packages
key.description: When a package is no longer required, it is added to a list.
